name: Crystal AMP (cAmp)
tagline: Crystal AMP (cAmp), Audio Player with custom playlist
body:
### Crystal AMP (cAmp)

Windows Audio Player with custom playlist.

Key features
* Plays most common audio files: WAV,FLAC,OGG,MP3,MP2,MPC,APE,WV,WMA
* Large visualization (types: FFT spectrum, oscilloscope, spectrogram)
* Global hot keys
* Song rating, rating filtering in playlist
* Playlist tabs (configurable rows and columns)
* Bookmarks (3 levels)

[Download](https://github.com/cryham/cAmp/releases)

###Screenshots of player with explanations

![Screenshots](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cryham/cAmp/master/cAmp/screenshots.png)

Full features list and changelog can be read here

[Features](https://github.com/cryham/cAmp/wiki/Features)

Recommended reading before using, getting started

[Using](https://github.com/cryham/cAmp/wiki/Using)
